originalText.text: After my original therapist left for a different company during covid I went through 4 different therapist each one worst than the last. The last therapist didn’t even write any notes and couldn’t remember what I told her from one week to the next. When I tried to explain it would make me feel more comfortable if she wrote notes cause it makes me feel like she isn’t paying attention when she can’t remember the things I tell her she told me that’s just the way she works and that I’m trying to tell her how to do her job, dismissing me and my feelings.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Vanessa Coradin for about 2 years now, I've had a terrible experience with her. From the start, she had been flaky, and is awful at communication. Recently, I haven't heard from her in 3 months. She usually would send a text when she was available, but she just stopped. I ended up contacting her because I was concerned and she basically ignored what I said, and switched the subject. Her excuse for not contacting me was because she wasn't sure I wanted to continue being her patient. Also, I was forced to do group therapy when I wanted individual. I'm very worried that she is still getting paid even though she isn't doing her job. I should've changed therapists a long time ago, she is literally the worst. She needs to lose her license.

originalText.text: I’ve only interacted with this provider remotely and their staff have been helpful since my intake. My therapist is very well informed and my psychiatrist is consistent. Can’t say I’ve had a negative experience with them so far.

text.text: I’ve only interacted with this provider remotely and their staff have been helpful since my intake. My therapist is very well informed and my psychiatrist is consistent. Can’t say I’ve had a negative experience with them so far.

originalText.text: I've had the unfortunate pleasure of seeing two therapists for a bit of time, one very unprofessional yet both inadequate  and like the previous reviewers say, are focussed on wasting time. The front desk has no shame in openly complaining about patients' rescheduling/ not picking up the phone and or having drama with other employees themselves. The psychiatrist was the best. I'm sure everyone is a good person, however this is just a poorly run facility. Best of luck to anyone going here.

text.text: I've had the unfortunate pleasure of seeing two therapists for a bit of time, one very unprofessional yet both inadequate  and like the previous reviewers say, are focussed on wasting time. The front desk has no shame in openly complaining about patients' rescheduling/ not picking up the phone and or having drama with other employees themselves. The psychiatrist was the best. I'm sure everyone is a good person, however this is just a poorly run facility. Best of luck to anyone going here.

originalText.text:
Had an 9:15 am appointment and I waited for 25 minuets. Then, the doctor came out and took another person. I went to the front desk and asked about my 9:15 appointment. I was told “ oh she just took her 9:am because she had to wait for someone to translate.” My problem is when were they going to tell me. It is presently 9:48 am and I am still waiting.
In addition to this problem, their front desk clerks are unprofessional. I was told by a young man at the front desk, “ we don’t work like that” when I tried to explain to him that my insurance isn’t working as I had to take six weeks off work. However, I had another insurance from my husband’s  which I would like to use. He continued to tell me that I have to stick to the insurance that I originally signed up with. In the end I paid a flat fee for the visit.
